name: VTuberUpdates
0:
”Alexa, ask v. tuber updates for an update on Amelia”
”Alexa, ask v. tuber updates for Polka”
”Alexa, ask v. tuber updates for the current status of Ame”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: v. tuber updates
des: Work-in-progress skill to give quick updates on VTubers streaming, will add VTubers over time and increase functionality. Currently will give statuses on select VTubers from hololive.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
